gcci.text: With H100 spot rates near $3.20/hr and US export controls limiting China’s access, Chinese hyperscalers face constrained chip availability and higher capex as they secure local alternatives and slower next-gen GPUs.

gtpi.text: At $1.25/1M input tokens, DeepSeek’s pricing reflects aggressive API competition that pressures margins while forcing efficiency gains across the model ecosystem.

gagl.text: A 120 TWh annual AI load risks significant grid strain unless nuclear baseload adoption and demand-shifting scale rapidly to curb carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Surging compute capex and token price compression are pushing margins thin, elevating bubble risk unless workloads and model commercialization scale sustainably.
